entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries becoming mixed with rain showers near noon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 2. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
